page.title: 06RELIGION, ARCHITECTURE.
page.content:
{St. Peter's Church, }Knowl Hill.
This church is of brick with flint decoration. The stained glass windows are framed in stone.
It has a steeple and a belfry with a single bell.There is a gallery, the nave has a screen dividing off the choir.
There are seats for {250 }people but only between 20 and 30 people attend each Sunday.
{St. John's Roman Catholic Chapel.
This was built by the sisters and their friends in{1950.} It can seat {100}people and about 70 people attend church each Sunday.
